title: Danger Bay calligraphic sans serif
content:
I used to watch 'Danger Bay' as a kid in the late 80s and just stumbled upon this opening title gem. Does anyone know what calligraphic type this is? It's got some similarities to a bunch of chancery typefaces. The show used a drop shadow variant but a non-shadow version would do me just fine.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DangerBay.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419133633/http:/typophile.com/files/DangerBay.jpg) | 17.43 KB |
| [DangerBay-Drop.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419133633/http:/typophile.com/files/DangerBay-Drop.jpg) | 15.52 KB |
author: tylor.reimer

comments.content: After pouring over scads of chancery typefaces I'm realizing how rare a double story \_a\_ is. Does anyone know the main method that type was made for title screens in 80s? Was it photolettering of some kind?
